sourcesContent:
import React, { FunctionComponent, useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { RouteComponentProps, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Pokemon from '../models/pokemon'; import formatDate from '../helpers/format-date'; import formatType from '../helpers/format-type'; type Params = { id: string };//l'id qui sera recupéré const PokemonsDetail: FunctionComponent> = ({ match }) => { const [pokemon, setPokemon] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { }, [match.params.id]); return (
{ pokemon ? (

{ pokemon.name }

edit
Nom { pokemon.name }
Points de vie { pokemon.hp }
Dégâts { pokemon.cp }
Types {pokemon.types.map(type => ( {type} ))}
Date de création {formatDate(pokemon.created)}
Retour
) : (

)}
); } export default PokemonDetail;
